Prerequisite: Only a hexblade with the fey pact can take this paragon path.

At 11th level, you can take on the valiant hexblade paragon path. You are a shining warrior armed with the Feywild's power and steeped in strange magic from an otherworldly patron.

VALIANT HEXBLADE PATH FEATURES

Valiant Hexblade's Action (11th level)

When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you regain a number of hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. In addition, you can take a free action to teleport a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier, either before or after the extra action.

White Well Curse (11th level)

You gain the curse of blinding radiance power.

White Well Visage (11th level)

You gain a +2 bonus to Diplomacy checks and initiative checks.

White Well Invocation (12th level)

You gain the white well invocation power.

Moonlit Soul Step (16th level)

When you use soul step, you become insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

White Well Transformation (20th level)

You gain the white well transformation power.

VALIANT HEXBLADE POWERS
